modules.description: Handles GraphQL requests using Opium's routing system, parsing and executing queries against a schema. Processes JSON input and generates JSON responses with query results. Enables real-time data fetching and mutation operations in web services.

Executes GraphQL requests using a schema and context, and constructs handlers for serving GraphQL APIs and GraphiQL interfaces. It works with GraphQL schemas, request and response objects from the Rock framework, and context values. It enables testing GraphQL endpoints directly and provides an in-memory GraphiQL interface for interacting with the API.
